title: NYPD Red 4 - James Patterson & Marshall Karp
description:
NYPD Red 4 by James Patterson & Marshall Karp
English | Mystery & Thriller | EPUB & MOBI | 951 KB

A jewel heist. A murdered actress. A killer case for NYPD Red.
In a city where crime never sleeps, NYPD Red is the elite task force called in when a case involves the rich, famous and connected. Detectives Zach Jordan and Kylie MacDonald are the best of the best â€“ brilliant and tireless investigators who will stop at nothing to catch a criminal, even if it means antagonising the same powerful people theyâ€™re supposed to be helping.
When a glitzy movie premiere is the scene of a shocking murder and high-stakes robbery, NYPD Red gets the call. In a hunt that takes Zach and Kylie from celebrity penthouses to the depths of Manhattanâ€™s criminal underworld, they have to find the cold-blooded killer â€“ before he strikes again
